author: denise_robinson
post: Enjoyed the show regarding the shroud of turin. Ray Downings’ effort to bring the face dimension is a great effort but he looks too good. Scripture tells us that he actually was not a comely man. The pictures we see in this day and age of jesus always portray him as rather handsome because that is what we like to see. Also the face you are portraying doesn’t look at all like the shroud. The face in the shroud is definitely not comely but I believe it is definitely Jesus..
title: Ray Downing of “The Real Face of Jesus?” TV Documentary received an Emmy for “Stealing Lincoln’s Body”
